desc: Cellu.lite is you one stop cellulite shop. Our products contain only the best raw ingredients, all with proven results in treating cellulite. We offer a home base cellulite treatment that tackles stubborn cellulite and fat cells in all stages of cellulite formation. Restore your confidence by reducing your cellulite.

layout.text: This range is designed to assist the 9 out of every 10 women who suffer from cellulite. Our products are scientifically formulated to assist with the visible appearance of cellulite.
